item.title: Needs a yellow box junction and red lines with cameras, 14th February
item.description:
Constant parking over the drop down stopping the disabled and elderly being able to cross safely. Also dangerous for people coming in and out as one side of the road is blocked. The drop down needs a yellow box and the road needs red lines with cameras.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2B-2C, Fairway, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Empty paint, chemical, oil cans…, 14th February
item.description:
We just watched the guys bring illegal commercial waste dumping by food trucks operating at 103 Union Street, London SE1 0LA, managed by Samsite Ltd (one of the 9 vendors operating out of the site is dumping here). They have been regularly discarding meat waste, used oil cans, and other rubbish into the residential bins outside my property. We have had more rats, oil spills and rotten food smell from the waste that they are putting in the residential bins. They just filled all our cans, can we get someone out to dispose of them properly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Southwark Bridge Road, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
